text: Guns! Guns! Guns! is a 1991 role-playing game supplement published by Blacksburg Tactical Research Center. ==Contents== Guns! Guns! Guns! is a system for weapon design intended to be used for any role-playing game.https://index.rpg.net/display-entry.phtml?mainid=5631 ==Reviews== *Dragon #192 ==References== Category:Role-playing game books
title: Guns! Guns! Guns!
